title.rendered: Air Timor Airlines – CoronaVirus (nCoVid 19) Travel updates

content.rendered:
Due to the novel CoronaVirus (nCoVid 19), many countries restricted the travel. Update your contact details via Manage booking to receive the latest updates or notifications regarding coronavirus or any updates in Air Timor Airlines. Customers can also check the website for the latest flight updates, rebooking and refund options.

Air Timor Airlines – Announcement

Due to the covid-19 pandemic spread and Governments around the world implementing travels bans to certain countries, Air Timor will be reducing its flights between singapore and Dill to once a week starting from 15 march 2020. All current customers booked on Thursday flights must change their travel dates to sunday flights at no extra cost. Any cancellations will be fully refunded.

Passenger who wants refund for the booked flight or rebook the flight on another date, you can contact the travel agent or Air Timor Airlines office directly.

To know more details for travel restrictions due to CoronaVirus (nCoVid 19) on many countries, visit here
